items.title: INCYMO launches AI-powered mobile gaming creative ad platform
items.description: INCYMO.AI launched its human-powered, AI-aided creative platform for crafting mobile gaming advertisements.

items.title: The watchful AI that never sleeps: Hakimo’s $10.5M bet on autonomous security
items.description: AI security startup Hakimo raises $10.5M to transform physical security with autonomous agents that monitor existing cameras 24/7, detecting threats a...

items.title: The open source Model Context Protocol was just updated — here’s why it’s a big deal
items.description: An updated version of the MCP spec introduced key upgrades to make AI agents more secure, capable and interoperable.

items.title: ‘Studio Ghibli’ AI image trend overwhelms OpenAI’s new GPT-4o feature, delaying free tier
items.description: The new feature has been widely embraced by users of X, but it raises copyright concerns and goes against Studio Ghibli's creator.

items.title: SingularityNET and Star Atlas partner to combine Web3 games and AI Agents
items.description: SingularityNET, a founding member of the ASI Alliance, has partnered with ATMTA, maker of Star Atlas, the Web3 space exploration online game.
